metadata.name: OCTOPUS DELIRIUM #01
metadata.description:
The oldest known octopus fossil is about 296 million years old. Octopuses have three hearts, blue blood and can regenerate cut limbs. Two-thirds of an octopusâ€™ neurones reside in its arms. After mating, males wander off to die.

___

OCTOPUS DELIRIUM #1 is part of cross-chain series of works in which I explore the octopus as leitmotif.
